StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMemo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@memoID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SELECT ms.ID, mst.[Type], mst.[ID] 'TypeId', ms.[Date], ms.[Content], ms.Subject FROM [usmc].[MemoSheet] ms INNER JOIN [usmc].[MemoSheetType] mst ON mst.ID = ms.MemoSheetTypeID WHERE ms.ID = @memoID
END
